slide.title: Disassembling 1
slide.example:
number of ops: 12
0 NOP 0, 0, 0 1 FETCH_W $0, 'a', 1 2 ASSIGN $1, $0, '5' 3 FETCH_W $2, 'a', 1 4 SEND_REF 0, $2, 1 5 DO_FCALL $3, 'apply_magic', 0 6 INIT_STRING %4, 0, 0 7 FETCH_R $5, 'a', 1 8 ADD_VAR %4, %4, $5 9 ADD_CHAR %4, %4, '10' 10 ECHO 0, %4, 0 11 RETURN 0, '1', 0
